sentences.en: Better a glorious death than a shameful life.
sentences.cn: 宁可光明磊落地死,决不卑鄙无耻地生.

sentences.en: He accused the company of "shameful foot-dragging".
sentences.cn: 他批评这家公司“极其拖沓”。

sentences.en: He feels it very shameful to sponge on his parents after he's grown up.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己长大了还依赖父母感觉很丢脸.

sentences.en: His ignorance, no longer seemed touching, but merely shameful.
sentences.cn: 他的麻木不再打动人心, 而仅仅是可耻的.

sentences.en: It is very shameful of him to show off.
sentences.cn: 他向人炫耀自己,真不害臊.

sentences.en: It was shameful the way she was treated.
sentences.cn: 她竟然受到那样的对待，太不像话了。

sentences.en: It’s shameful the way some people treat their pets.
sentences.cn: 有些人如此对待自己的宠物，真是可耻。

sentences.en: My presence in his sanctum was evidently esteemed a piece of impudence too shameful for remark.
sentences.cn: 我在他的圣地出现,显然被他看作是羞于提及的莽撞事情.

sentences.en: Of course, we are aware of their shameful actions.
sentences.cn: 当然,他们的无耻行径, 我们是有数的.

sentences.en: Only those who have no sense of shame can do such shameful things.
sentences.cn: 只有不要脸的人才能做出这样不要脸的事.

sentences.en: So what if he had been sick had contracted a shameful disease?
sentences.cn: 虽然闹过病,犯过见不起人的症候,有什么关系 呢 .

sentences.en: The idea that she witnessed this shameful incident meant nothing to him.
sentences.cn: 虽然她目睹了这可耻的一幕，但是这对他来说无关紧要。

sentences.en: There's nothing shameful in being a spinster.
sentences.cn: 当老处女也没什么丢人的,看看皮蒂姑妈.

sentences.en: They played a shameful [ despicable ] role in this farce.
sentences.cn: 他们在这场闹剧中扮演了可耻 [ 鄙 ] 的角色.

sentences.en: We must expose this shameful activity to the newspapers.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要向报社揭露这一无耻行径.

sentences.en: When his employers discovered his shameful past, they hounded him out of the company.
sentences.cn: 当他的雇主发现他过去不光彩的行为后, 就把他从公司赶了出去.

words.tran_cn: 无耻的；不要脸的；伤风败俗的
不知羞耻地；厚着脸皮地
羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人

trans.tran_cn: 可耻的，丢脸的，不体面的，猥亵的
trans.tran_en: that should make you feel ashamed
